attributes.action: call on Post Office Ltd not to close St. Breward Post Office in Cornwall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
St. Breward Post Office is a rural post office in Cornwall under threat of closure by Post Office Ltd.

We have no public transport here and many residents would be unable to make the 6-mile round trip to the next nearest post office (if indeed that is not also closed).

It is not just a post office but a newsagents, gift shop, Internet cafe, pizzeria, art gallery and general meeting place for all the villagers.

Please sign our petition and help us to stop Post Office Ltd from ripping the heart out of our community.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "call on Post Office Ltd not to close St. Breward Post Office in Cornwall."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19865


Prime Minister's Office
